observation: I can see the Specter.AI trading platform homepage with a large heading 'Trade smarter with AI-powered insights'. There are two prominent buttons visible: 'Create Account' and 'Get Started'. As an elderly user, I notice the buttons are reasonably sized and visible. There's also a 'Sign Up' button in the header. I need to start the registration process.
reasoning: As a 70-year-old user looking to sign up for this trading platform, I should click on 'Create Account' as it's clearly labeled and appears to be the main call-to-action for registration. The button is large enough for me to tap easily and has good contrast.

dual_diagnosis.visual_observation: The page transitioned from the landing page with 'Create Account' and 'Get Started' buttons to a loading state with a red circular loading indicator in the center of the screen. The header with Specter.AI logo and Sign Up button remains visible.
